skillTree.name: Bound by Contract
skillTree.description: There are some deals that it would be extremely unwise to renege on…

skillTree.name: Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

skillTree.name: Stalker
skillTree.description: Treason is never straightforward, especially when your every move is watched and reported.

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords have a chance to gain 2 loyalty
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Manbane
skillTree.description: Even the merest scratch caused by a blade edged with Manbane causes death.

skillTree.name: Black Lotus
skillTree.description: This poison contains a powerful narcotic that drives its victims to delusional insanity.

skillTree.name: Dance of Death
skillTree.description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Precise
skillTree.description: Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Shroud of Darkness
skillTree.description: This one doesn't just move in the shadows, they *are* the shadows…

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Counter-Striker
skillTree.description: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

skillTree.name: Bloody Blade
skillTree.description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Hawk-Eyed
skillTree.description: You have to get up very early if you want to beat this one; nothing escapes their keen eye and lightning reflexes.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Deadeye
skillTree.description: Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.

skillTree.name: In the Corner of Your Eye
skillTree.description: A shadow, shape, or image, barely perceived, dogs your steps and haunts your mind.

skillTree.name: Shadows Guard
skillTree.description: Those who live in shadow know how to avoid being seen.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +3% for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: +6% for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Missile resistance: +10% for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Way of the Poisoned Sword
skillTree.description: No contract is beyond my skill.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +2 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Hardened by Cruelty
skillTree.description: Surviving in the harsh wilderness of Naggaroth is no easy task.

effects.description:
Armour: +3 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +6 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

Armour: +10 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Trust No One
skillTree.description: Anyone could be an assassin in disguise, on their way to fulfilling their latest contract.

effects.description:
Character's aura leadership effect: -3
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.name: Hidden Paths
skillTree.description: There is always another way.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Disciple
skillTree.description: Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Notorious
skillTree.description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.

skillTree.name: Contacts
skillTree.description: Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.

skillTree.name: Shadow
skillTree.description: Always watching.

skillTree.name: Grandmaster
skillTree.description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

skillTree.name: Scavenge
skillTree.description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Increase Slave Income
skillTree.description: Civilisation requires slaves. It is upon their toil that the future depends.

effects.description: Increase Slave Income action: Income from slaves is increased by an additional +1%
Increase Slave Income action: Income from slaves is increased by an additional +3%
Increase Slave Income action: Income from slaves is increased by an additional +5%

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Cruel
backgroundSkills.description: To cause another's suffering, to delight in their pain, to extend their agony according to your whim. That is power.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +25%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Malevolent
backgroundSkills.description: Evil-minded, poisonous malignancy. For its own sake.

backgroundSkills.name: Malicious
backgroundSkills.description: When this one is abroad you can be sure that malice is borne towards anyone and everyone.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -25% for Cult of Khaine or Cult of Pleasure buildings
	(local region)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Death Hags
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Vicious
backgroundSkills.description: "Some folk call me vicious. I'll scoop out the eyes of any who utter it in my presence."

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Ambush Master
backgroundSkills.description: From shadows we came...

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 during ambushes
	(all units in army)

Ambush success chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Blood of Asur
backgroundSkills.description: They will pay for what should be ours!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% when fighting against High Elves
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +5 when fighting against High Elves
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Harpies of Naggarond
backgroundSkills.description: Deadly and fast as northern wind.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 for Harpies units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Shadows of Naggarond
backgroundSkills.description: They don't need armour to kill their enemies. Bloody!

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(all units in army)

Armour: -5 for Shades and Dark Riders units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Tyrant
backgroundSkills.description: They will tremble... You too, in time...

backgroundSkills.name: First Strike
backgroundSkills.description: For Khaine!
